Definition at line 540 of file report.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $ReportPackageName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'report_package_name' , 'string' , false );
                        $ReportPackageName = $Options->get_setting( 'report_package_name' , $ReportPackageName );
                        
                        $ReportPackageVersion = $this->Security->get_gp( 'report_package_version' , 'string' , 'last' );
                        $ReportPackageVersion = $Options->get_setting( 'report_package_version' , $ReportPackageVersion );
                        
                        $FunctionName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'function_name' , 'string' , 'report' );
                        $FunctionName = $Options->get_setting( 'function_name' , $FunctionName );
                        
                        $Extension = $this->Security->get_gp( 'output' , 'string' , 'txt' );
                        $Extension = $Options->get_setting( 'output' , $Extension );
                        
                        $Package = get_package( $ReportPackageName , $ReportPackageVersion , __FILE__ );
                        
                        if( method_exists( $Package , $FunctionName ) )
                        {
                              call_user_func( array( $Package , $FunctionName ) , $Options );
                              
                              if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'report_template' , 'integer' , false ) !== false )
                              {
                                    /* it means that the function 'report' has returned data, not the generated report */
                                    $ReportTemplate = $this->get_report_template( $this->Security->get_gp( 'report_package_name' , 'string' ) , $this->Security->get_gp( 'report_package_version' , 'string' , 'last' ) , $this->Security->get_gp( 'report_template' , 'integer' ) , $this->Security->get_gp( 'subfolder' , 'command' , '' ) );
                                    $Package->Output = $this->String->print_record( $ReportTemplate , $Package->Output );
                              }
                              
                              header( 'HTTP/1.0 200 OK' );
                              header( 'Content-type: application/octet-stream' );
                              header( 'Content-Length: '.strlen( $Package->Output ) );
                              header( 'Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="'.date( 'YmdHid' ).".$Extension".'"' );
                              header( 'Connection: close' );
                              
                              $this->Output = $Package->Output;
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              throw( new Exception( "Method \"$FunctionName\" does not exists in the package \"$ReportPackageName.$ReportPackageVersion\"" ) );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 382 of file report.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'report_button' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
                              
                              $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) );
                              $Code = "<a id=\"report_opener_$id\" href=\"javascript:void(0);\">{title}</a><div id=\"$id\">".
                                          "<span class=\"package_name\">{package_name}</span>".
                                          "<span class=\"package_version\">{package_version}</span>".
                                          "<span class=\"report_name\">{report_name}</span>".
                                          '{static_content:package_name={package_name};package_version={package_version};'.
                                          "template={template}}</div>{dialog:selector=#$id;opener=#report_opener_$id;".
                                          "ok_processor=ultimix.report.OnRunReportGeneration}";
                              
                              $Code = str_replace( '{title}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'title' ) , $Code );
                              $Code = str_replace( 
                                    '{package_name}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' ) , $Code
                              );
                              $Code = str_replace( 
                                    '{package_version}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' ) , $Code
                              );
                              $Code = str_replace( '{template}' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'template' ) , $Code );
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{report_button:$Params}" , $Code , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

process_report_query ( $  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'report_query'.

Parameters:
$Str - String to process.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 281 of file report.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'report_query' , array( 'query' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
                              
                              $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' , false );
                              
                              $Query = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'query' , false );
                              
                              if( $Query )
                              {
                                    $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
                                    $Records = $this->Database->query( $Query );
                                    $Records = $this->Database->fetch_results( $Records );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $AccessPackageName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'access_package_name' );
                                    $AccessPackageVersion = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'access_package_version' , 'last' );
                                    
                                    $Provider = get_package( $AccessPackageName , $AccessPackageVersion , __FILE__ );
                                    
                                    $AccessFunctionName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'func_name' );
                                    
                                    $Records = call_user_func( array( $Provider , $AccessFunctionName ) , $this->BlockSettings );
                              }
                              
                              if( $Name === false )
                              {
                                    $TemplatePackageName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'template_package_name' );
                                    $TemplatePackageVersion = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'template_package_version' , 'last' );
                                    $TemplateName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'template' );
                                    
                                    $Path = _get_package_path_ex( $TemplatePackageName , $TemplatePackageVersion )."/res/templates/$TemplateName";
                                    $RawTemplate = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $Path );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $RawTemplate = $this->Templates[ $Name ];
                              }
                              
                              $FormattedRecords = '';
                              
                              foreach( $Records as $k => $r )
                              {
                                    $Template = $RawTemplate;
                                    $Template = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $r );
                                    $Template = str_replace( '{rowid}' , $k + 1 , $Template );
                                    $Template = str_replace( '{recid}' , $k , $Template );
                                    if( $k % 2 )
                                    {
                                          $Template = str_replace( '{odd_factor}' , 'odd' , $Template );
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $Template = str_replace( '{odd_factor}' , 'even' , $Template );
                                    }
                                    $FormattedRecords .= $Template;
                              }
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( "{report_query:$Params}" , $FormattedRecords , $Str );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

process_report_template_list ( $  Str,
$  Changed 
)

Function processes macro 'report_template_list'.

Parameters:
$Str - String to process.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).
Exceptions:
Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 147 of file report.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $Params = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'report_template_list' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Params );
                              
                              /* \~english getting macro parameters */
                              $PackageName = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' );
                              $PackageVersion = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' );
                              $Subfolder = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'subfolder' , '' );
                              $ReportsPath = _get_package_path_ex( $PackageName , $PackageVersion )."/res/reports/";
                              if( $Subfolder != '' )
                              {
                                    $ReportsPath .= $Subfolder.'/';
                              }
                              $this->BlockSettings->set_setting( 
                                    'name' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' , 'report_template' )
                              );
                              
                              /* \~english getting list of reports */
                              $Reports = $this->Utilities->get_files_from_directory( $ReportsPath , '/\.rep/' );

                              $Ids = array();
                              $Titles = array();
                              
                              foreach( $Reports as $i => $r )
                              {
                                    $Ids [] = $i;
                                    $Titles [] = basename( $r , '.rep' );
                              }
                              
                              if( $Subfolder != '' )
                              {
                                    $Subfolder = '<input type="hidden" name="subfolder" value="'.$Subfolder.'">';
                              }
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( 
                                    "{report_template_list:$Params}" , 
                                    "$Subfolder{select:class=width_320 flat;".$this->BlockSettings->get_all_settings().';first='.
                                          implode( '|' , $Ids ).';second='.implode( '|' , $Titles ).'}' , 
                                    $Str
                              );
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
